revisions.revision: The hell is that last structure for?

float32.name: Launch Radius
float32.tooltip: each shot will be fired with a random offset in this radius in the x/y plane above the target location

float32.name: Launch z Height
float32.tooltip: strike will be launched at this plane height above the target location

float32.name: Launch Warmup
float32.tooltip: seconds to wait before launching the strike

float32.name: Launch Arrival
float32.tooltip: seconds to wait until the launch site marker is removed

float32.name: Launch Cooldown
float32.tooltip: seconds to wait before the next launch will be ready

float32.name: Launch Duration
float32.tooltip: how long a launch should take to fire all rounds

int32.name: Shots Per Launch
int32.tooltip: number of rounds to fire per launch

tagRef.name: Fire Effect
tagRef.tooltip: the effect that will be created when the strike fires.
